show_name: Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Eikō no Yakiniku Road (movie 11)
other_title: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ 栄光のヤキニクロード (Japanese)
蠟筆小新-風起雲湧！光榮燒肉之路 (Chinese (Taiwan))
蠟筆小新劇場版 - 烤肉反擊戰 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: While planning to have an extravagant barbecue at night, the Nohara family suddenly finds itself falsely incriminated by a mysterious organization. Shin-chan and his kin must then desperately run away while trying to discover who is behind all of this.
